resources.string: Welcome to TremorSense. To begin, please select an option below.
Here, you can view past results for full and custom tests, as well as view statistics about your overall use of TremorSense

This screen allows you to perform a full tremor test, using both left and right hands and in three different positions: 
 • The device on top of your hand, extend in front of you (postural and intention tremor). 
 • The device on top of your hand, resting on your lap (resting tremor). 
 • Holding the device by your side. 
 The app will tell you which position to use as you progress through the test. It should take about 3 minutes to complete. You may want to take a note describing whether you're hungry, tired, have had caffeine, or are anxious.
